active_learning.discussion_prompt: How would you apply this concept in your work environment?
active_learning.peer_teaching: Pair students: One explains API Gateway authentication mechanisms (e.g., JWT validation, OAuth 2.0 flows, mutual TLS) while the partner covers rate limiting strategies and input validation techniques. Switch roles, then discuss common misconceptions, such as assuming TLS alone provides full security without additional controls.
active_learning.problem_solving: Scenario: A fintech microservices app experiences DDoS attacks, SQL injection attempts, and unauthorized access. In groups, propose an API Gateway security architecture with specific configurations (e.g., rate limiting thresholds, WAF rules). Justify choices using OWASP guidelines and test your design against simulated attack vectors.
